tn.text: Baruch wrote down the words that Jeremiah said.

tn.ref: in the fourth year of Jehoiakim
tn.text: "while Jehoiakim had been ruling Judah for the fourth year"

tn.ref: This is what you must say to him
tn.text: Yahweh is telling Jeremiah what to say to Baruch.

tn.ref: This is true over all the earth
tn.text: AT: "This will happen over the entire earth"

tn.ref: But are you hoping for great things for yourself?
tn.text: AT: "You do hope for great things for yourself" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
things stolen from a place by force
AT: "I will allow you to live. That will be the best you can hope for." See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
